items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description:
You regain 2d4 + 2 hit points when you drink this potion. 

• The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

items.name: Potion of Greater Healing
items.description:
You regain 4d4 + 4 hit points when you drink this potion. 

• The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

items.name: Potion of Superior Healing
items.description:
You regain 8d4 + 8 hit points when you drink this potion. 

• The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

items.name: Potion of Supreme Healing
items.description:
You regain 10d4 + 20 hit points when you drink this potion. 

• The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

items.name: Elixir of Health
items.description:
When you drink this potion, it cures any disease afflicting you, and it removes the blinded, deafened, paralyzed, and poisoned conditions. 

• The clear red liquid has tiny bubbles of light in it.

items.name: Potion of Poison
items.description:
If you drink it, you take 3d6 poison damage, and you must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned.

 At the start of each of your turns while you are poisoned in this way, you take 3d6 poison damage. 

At the end of each of your turns, you can repeat the saving throw. 

On a successful save, the poison damage you take on your subsequent turns decreases by 1d6. 

The poison ends when the damage decreases to 0.

• This concoction looks, smells, and tastes like a potion of healing or other beneficial potion. However, it is actually poison masked by illusion magic. An identify spell reveals its true nature.

items.name: Philter of Love
items.description:
The next time you see a creature within 10 minutes after drinking this philter, you become charmed by that creature for 1 hour. 

If the creature is of a species and gender you are normally attracted to, you regard it as your true love while you are charmed. 

• This potion's rose-hued, effervescent liquid contains one easy-to-miss bubble shaped like a heart.

items.name: Potion of Fire Breath
items.description:
fter drinking this potion, you can use a bonus action to exhale fire at a target within 30 feet of you. 

The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. 

The effect ends after you exhale the fire three times or when 1 hour has passed. 

• This potion's orange liquid flickers, and smoke fills the top of the container and wafts out whenever it is opened.

items.name: Potion of Climbing
items.description:
When you drink this potion, you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour. 

During this time, you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks you make to climb. 

• The potion is separated into brown, silver, and gray layers resembling bands of stone. Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.

items.name: Potion of Heroism
items.description:
You gain 10 temporary hit points that last for 1 hour. 

For the same duration, you are under the effect of the bless spell (no concentration required). 

• This blue potion bubbles and steams as if boiling.

items.name: Potion of Invisibility
items.description:
When you drink it, you become invisible for 1 hour. Anything you wear or carry is invisible with you. 

The effect ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

• This potion's container looks empty but feels as though it holds liquid.

items.name: Potion of Mind Reading
items.description:
When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the detect thoughts spell (save DC 13). 

• The potion's dense, purple liquid has an ovoid cloud of pink floating in it.

items.name: Potion of Water Breathing
items.description:
You can breathe underwater for 1 hour after drinking this potion.

•  Its cloudy green fluid smells of the sea and has a jellyfish-like bubble floating in it.

items.name: Potion of Animal Friendship
items.description:
When you drink this potion, you can cast the animal friendship spell (save DC 13) for 1 hour at will. 

• Agitating this muddy liquid brings little bits into view: a fish scale, a hummingbird tongue, a cat claw, or a squirrel hair.

items.name: Potion of Diminution
items.description:
When you drink this potion, you gain the "reduce" effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1d4 hours (no concentration required). 

• The red in the potion's liquid continuously contracts to a tiny bead and then expands to color the clear liquid around it. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

items.name: Potion of Growth
items.description:
When you drink this potion, you gain the "enlarge" effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1d4 hours (no concentration required). 

• The red in the potion's liquid continuously expands from a tiny bead to color the clear liquid around it and then contracts. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

items.name: Potion of Gaseous Form
items.description:
When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the gaseous form spell for 1 hour (no concentration required) or until you end the effect as a bonus action. 

• This potion's container seems to hold fog that moves and pours like water.

items.name: Potion of Resistance
items.description:
When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to 1 type of damage for 1 hour.

(The resistance is pre-determined)

items.name: Potion of Speed
items.description:
When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the haste spell for 1 minute (no concentration required). 

• The potion's yellow fluid is streaked with black and swirl on its own.

items.name: Potion of Flying
items.description:
When you drink this potion, you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour and can hover. 

If you're in the air when the potion wears off, you fall unless you have some other means of staying aloft. 

• This potion's clear liquid floats at the top of its container and has cloudy white impurities drifting in it.

items.name: Potion of Clairvoyance
items.description:
When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the clairvoyance spell. 

• An eyeball bobs in this yellowish liquid but vanishes when the potion is opened.

items.name: Potion of Vitality
items.description:
When you drink this potion, it removes any exhaustion you are suffering and cures any disease or poison affecting you. 

For the next 24 hours, you regain the maximum number of hit points for any Hit Die you spend. 

• The potion's crimson liquid regularly pulses with dull light, calling to mind a heartbeat.

items.name: Potion of Invulnerability
items.description:
For 1 minute after you drink this potion, you have resistance to all damage. 

• The potion's syrupy liquid looks like liquefied iron.

items.name: Oil of Etherealness
items.description:
Beads of this cloudy gray oil form on the outside of its container and quickly evaporate. 

The oil can cover a Medium or smaller creature, along with the equipment it's wearing and carrying (one additional vial is required for each size category above Medium). 

Applying the oil takes 10 minutes. The affected creature then gains the effect of the etherealness spell for 1 hour.

items.name: Oil of Sharpness
items.description:
This clear, gelatinous oil sparkles with tiny, ultrathin silver shards. The oil can coat one slashing or piercing weapon or up to 5 pieces of slashing or piercing ammunition. 

Applying the oil takes 1 minute. For 1 hour, the coated item is magical and has a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

items.name: Oil of Slipperiness
items.description:
This sticky black unguent is thick and heavy in the container, but it flows quickly when poured. 

The oil can cover a Medium or smaller creature, along with the equipment it's wearing and carrying (one additional vial is required for each size category above Medium). 

Applying the oil takes 10 minutes. The affected creature then gains the effect of a freedom of movement spell for 8 hours.

Alternatively, the oil can be poured on the ground as an action, where it covers a 10-foot square, duplicating the effect of the grease spell in that area for 8 hours.

items.name: Potion of Longevity
items.description:
When you drink this potion, your physical age is reduced by 1d6 + 6 years, 
(If you are under 13 years of age this potion has no effect)

Each time you subsequently drink a potion of longevity, there is 10 percent cumulative chance that you instead age by 1d6 + 6 years. 

• Suspended in this amber liquid are a scorpion's tail, an adder's fang, a dead spider, and a tiny heart that, against all reason, is still beating. These ingredients vanish when the potion is opened.

items.name: Potion of Hill Giant Strength
items.description:
When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 21 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

• This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a hill giant.

items.name: Potion of Frost Giant Strength
items.description:
When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

• This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a frost giant.

items.name: Potion of Fire Giant Strength
items.description:
When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 25 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

• This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a fire giant.

items.name: Potion of Cloud Giant Strength
items.description:
When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 27 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

• This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a cloud giant.

items.name: Potion of Storm Giant Strength
items.description:
When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 29 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

• This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a storm giant.

items.name: Potion of Deep Slumber
items.description:
When this potion is consumed in combat, the consumer falls prone, in a magical sleep, unconscious for 2 rounds and can not be roused.

They awake completely refreshed and rejuvinated...As though they took a long rest. 

They have all their spells, abilities, hit points, and are treated as though they in fact did just take a long rest. 

• This lavender concoction is warm to the touch.

items.name: Potion of Luck
items.description:
When you drink this potion you feel lucky.

For the next 10 minutes whenever you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can roll an additional d20 before the outcome is determined. 

You choose which of the d20s is used for the attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

• Suspended in this yellow liquid is a single coin made of platinum, perpetually spinning.

items.name: Potion of Berserker Rage
items.description:
When you drink this potion you go into a rage for 1 minute.

You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

When you make a melee weapon attack using Strength, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll. This bonus increases as you level.

You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

• The bottle's glass is too dark to see the contents of the potion.

items.name: Potion of Minor Spell Restoration
items.description:
When you drink this potion you gain a 1st level spell slot.

• A murky blue liquid in a tagged bottle that simply reads "Mana"

items.name: Potion of Spell Restoration
items.description:
When you drink this potion you gain a 2nd or 3rd level spell slot.

• A murky blue liquid in a tagged bottle that simply reads "Mana"

items.name: Potion of Major Spell Restoration
items.description:
When you drink this potion you gain a spell slot equal to your caster level divided by 2 rounded down.

• A murky blue liquid in a tagged bottle that simply reads "Mana"

items.name: Potion of Vigor
items.description:
When you drink this potion you gain 4d6 temporary hit points.

Remaining temporary hit points are depleted when you finish a long rest. 

• This blue liquid holds a single fang of a tiger.

items.name: Potion of Polymorph
items.description:
When you drink this potion you are polymorphed into a creature (Dm's choice) of CR value equal to or less then your level.

• The silver liquid can be seen shifting and churning.

items.name: Unstable Healing potion
items.description:
When you drink this potion roll 3d6. 

If the result is even, you heal for that amount.

If the result is odd, you take poison damage equal to the amount.

• The is the very first potion a very inexperienced alchimest has crafted.

items.name: Potion of Wild Magic
items.description:
When you drink this potion roll a d100 for the effects on the sorcerer wild magic chart

• The potions contents are changing at an alarming rate.

items.name: Oil of Chain Reaction
items.description:
you can throw this set of vials up to 20 feet. 

every creature in a 15ft Radius must make a DC 14 Dexterity check.

On a fail the creature taked 5d6 Fire damage, on a success they take half damage.

• Three different colored vials tied together.

items.name: Potion of Darkvision
items.description:
When you drink this potion you gain 60ft of Darkvision for 2 hours.

• A small eye can be seen floating in the black liquid

items.name: Oil of Firefly
items.description:
you can throw this set of vials up to 20 feet. 

every creature in a 15ft Radius must make a DC 14 Dexterity check.

On a fail the creature is effected by the "Faerie Fire" spell

• Two luminous liquid filled vials tied together.

items.name: Potion of sleep
items.description:
When you drink this potion you fall prone, unconscious in a magical for 1 hour.

you gain the benifits of a short rest.

Detect magic has no effect on this potion.

• This white potion is warm to the touch.

items.name: Potion of Second Chance
items.description:
When you drink this potion you gain the effects of the "Death Ward" spell

• Gold and Silver streaks can be seen swirling inside the potion.

items.name: Potion of Mental Fortitude
items.description:
When you drink this potion, for 1 hour you gain advantage on all Intellegence, Wisdom, and Charisma spell saves.

• A light vapour is building above the liquid of this potion.

items.name: Potion of Message
items.description:
While you hold this potion, you can invoke its magic to record a message.

The user can store up to 50 words into the potion.

Anyone who drinks the potion will hear in their head the message stored within the potion.

Detect Magic has no effect on this potion.
 
• A faint yellow glow emanates from the potion.

items.name: Potion of Hallucinations
items.description:
When you drink this potion you have the ability to communicate with animals, plants, and objects.

In actuality the drinker is Hallucinating. and its all in their head.

Detect magic has no effect on this potion.

items.name: Potion of Rest
items.description:
When you drink this potion you remove 1 point of exhaustion.

• this brown potion has the distinct smell of roasted beans.
